summary: Tested Admin Dashboard Tabs alignment and Sidebar Volgorde (Module Order) settings. All features working correctly. Admin tabs are horizontally aligned on one line (height=36px). Sidebar order settings allow users to reorder modules with up/down arrows and save with success toast.
critical_code_review_comments: Admin tabs use inline-flex with min-w-max and whitespace-nowrap for horizontal alignment
TabsList has overflow-x-auto for scrolling on smaller screens
SidebarOrderSettings component correctly loads user's active modules and saved order
Module order is saved to user_sidebar_settings collection in MongoDB
Layout.js getOrderedModules() function correctly applies user's saved order to sidebar
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin dashboard tabs are now horizontally aligned with scrollable container. Sidebar Volgorde feature fully implemented - users can reorder modules via Instellingen -> Sidebar Volgorde. Order is saved per user in user_sidebar_settings collection. After saving, user needs to reload page to see changes in sidebar.

admin_dashboard_tabs_alignment.details: All 11 tabs (Klanten, Betalingen, Add-ons, Verzoeken, Workspaces, Domains, Domeinen, Betalen, Email, Website, Update) displayed horizontally on one line. TabsList height=36px confirms single-line layout.

sidebar_volgorde_navigation.details: Sidebar Volgorde option visible in Instellingen navigation menu. Clicking shows Module Volgorde section.

module_list_with_positions.details: Modules displayed with position numbers (1-5) and status (Actief). Modules shown: Vastgoed Beheer, HRM, Auto Dealer, Boekhouding (Gratis), Test Add-on.

module_reorder_arrows.details: Up/down arrow buttons present for each module. Clicking down arrow moves module down in list.

save_order_functionality.details: Save button appears after making changes. Clicking Save shows success toast: 'Module volgorde opgeslagen! Herlaad de pagina om de wijzigingen te zien.'
